pros: Has strong map control with Aether Swords that fly around the map
Has a reactive playstyle with useful skills that can be used to dash back from danger or negate damage with precise timing
Has a bind Blade Torrent
Has 2 iFrame Aether Guard and Infinite
cons: Has micro-management with keeping track of cooldowns and active Aether Swords
Can be a bit spammy by constantly pressing buttons to keep damage up

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives and buffs with cooldowns
Final Damage: +55% + (up to 15% from Resonance Rush buff)
Boss Damage: +10% + (up to 4% from Link Skill)
Ignore DEF: +20% + (up to 15% from Resonance Rush buff)

details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Trigger - Reinforce and Trigger - Boss Rush

extraContent.title: Aether Weaving
extraContent.content:
Adele has a secondary resource (unlocked in 2nd Job) called Aether Weaving that is used to activate certain skills and create 'Aether Swords' that can be commanded. Aether Weaving is generated passively and whenever you attack an enemy with a 'Trigger' skill

  • Every 100 'Aether Weaving', an Aether Sword is readied
  • When a sword is readied, you can summon it using Hunting Decree (3rd Job)
  • These swords are used primarily for and cannot be used before 3rd Job
  • Each sword represents 100 AE which skills that consume AE can use
  • In 2nd Job, you can hold up to 2 Swords (200 AE) at a time and 3 Swords (300 AE) in 4th Job+
  • Note if you use any skill that consumes AE, your Aether Sword will disappear and be consumed as AE

Below is a list of all Trigger skills:

  • Skewering (2nd Job)
  • Eviscerate (3rd Job)
  • Cleave (4th Job)
  • Plummet (4th Job)

details:
This skill is gained and leveled up by completing the Adele storyline
  • The storyline spans all the way up to Lv. 200

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.desc: Swings a sword forward
Creates homing shards that seek out nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.desc: Double jump skill
details:
Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
  • While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump

primary.desc: While in the air, pressing the Skill Key or pressing the Up Key twice will allow you to float for a short period of time
details: Using the skill again or using will stop the skill
You can lock the skill by right-clicking the skill to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys
To unlock this skill, you need to complete Adele's storyline

primary.desc: A special resource that generates passively and whenever you attack an enemy with a 'Trigger' skill
Whenever an Aether Sword attack hits an enemy, there is a chance to leave behind a crystal
details: Using Resonance will dash towards the crystals consuming it

Up to 7 crystals can be active at a time and last 30 secs each
  • Creating a new crystal will cause the oldest crystal to expire if there are already 7 crystals active

primary.desc: Launches multiple swords forward
When toggled, when a Trigger skills hit an enemy, Aether Swords will brandish in front of you that has a chance to leave behind a
details: The size of the attack will change based on the amount of Aether Energy you have currently
Hunting Decree (3rd Job) can only be activated when this skill is toggled on
Cooldown of the attack will be reduced each Job Advancement
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.desc: Creates an Aether Sword while shooting it forward that leaves behind a
details: You can use the Arrow Keys to decide the direction the Aether Sword is launched
Can be linked with Resonance Rush to quickly dash but no crystal will be created

primary.desc: Lunges a sword forward while dashing
details: Deals increased %Damage the fewer enemies there are

Can only be used when there is a nearby or when linked with
  • crystal will disappear if you dash to it
You can use the Arrow Keys to decide the direction you dash towards
If the skill hits an enemy, you gain a stacking buff that increases %Final Damage and %Ignore DEF (up to 3 times)

primary.desc: When toggled, Trigger attacks will periodically activate automatically
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of

primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)
Slashes your sword forward
Summons 2 Aether Swords to seek out and attack nearby enemies
details:
Up to 4 Aether Swords can be active at a time (in 3rd Job)
  • The oldest Aether Swords will be replaced if 4 are already active
Can only be activated when is toggled on
Attack has a chance to create a
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.desc: Commands all your swords to return to you while damaging and debuffing enemies in its path
details: [Debuff]: Adele's attack towards this target has increased %Ignore DEF
Attack has a chance to create a
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.desc: Creates a zone of piercing swords
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect
At the end of the duration, the attack explodes damaging nearby enemies

primary.desc: Creates a barrier around you where party members redirect some of the damage to you by creating a shield for you
details: Pressing the Skill Key again will cancel the shield

primary.desc: Dashes backward
details: Can be used while using a 'Trigger' skill
[Passive]: Permanently increases Movement Speed, Jump and Max Movement Speed
Increases max Aether and amount of swords creatable from 4 to 6

primary.desc: Slashes a giant sword forward
details: There are 3 different attacks that can randomly trigger

primary.desc: Commands all your swords to spin damaging nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect and cooldown resets
Duration of Aether Swords will not go down when attack is active
Attack has a chance to create a crystal
If an enemy is hit by multiple Aether Swords, each additional sword deals reduced damage

primary.desc: Marks an enemy causing all Aether Swords to target them
details: [Debuff]: Attacks towards this enemy deals increased %Damage and %Ignore Def
If you press the Skill Key again, the mark can be moved to another target if there is a mark active
The skill will target the enemy with the highest Max HP
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.desc: An Aether Sword rotates around you, protecting you
details: When held, damage taken including %HP attacks is reduced
If you press and release the Skill Key instantly, you will instead parry an enemy attack, becoming invincible for a few seconds
Cooldown is reduced based on the duration the skill was held
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.desc: Dive down at your location damaging enemies in your path
details: Can be used in the air to dive down vertically

primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

details: Increases %Weapon Mastery and Attack provided
Increases %p Damage increased provided
Increases %Damage of all Trigger skills
Increases %Ignore DEF of all Trigger skills
Increases %Boss Damage of all Trigger skills

hyperActive.desc: Creates shards at the location of enemies that explode
details: Deals damage when the shards land and explode
Deals increased %Damage if only one enemy is hit
Creates at the location of the explosion

fifthMain.name: Ruin
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 15
An attack that deals 500% damage 6 times when summoned and activates 12 times.
After it's summoned, an additional sword pierce deals 900% damage 9 times and activates 8 times.
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a giant sword that rains down from the sky dealing damage while coming down and after it lands

fifthMain.name: Infinity Blade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, invincible during casting and disarmament
Duration: 30 sec, creates 18 aether swords that attack 2 times with 700% damage
On successful hits, 5% chance to create an aether crystal.
Cooldown 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates several special Aether Swords that seek out and attack nearby enemies like
details: Infinity Blade Aether Swords are only affected by and cannot trigger or
Has a small chance to create a crystal
You are invincible at the initial cast and at the end of the skill
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Legacy Restoration
fifthMain.shortDesc:
2% max MP will be consumed every sec while casting and after casting
Duration: 30 sec, Damage: 40%, Aether obtained: 75%, +2 aether swords that can be commanded with Hunting Decree
Periodically spreads enchanted wings to attack 6 mobs with 1800% damage 3 times and restores 9.5% of max HP for you and your party members.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Increases %Damage, Aether Weaving generation rate, the maximum number of swords commanded by
details: Periodically, your wings flap dealing damage to nearby enemies and healing nearby party members and yourself

fifthMain.name: Storm
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Duration: 14 sec. Automatically attacks up to 7 nearby enemies periodically, for 500% damage 2 time(s).\nThe skill's attack count is increased by 2 for every 2 aether swords recalled beyond the first pair.\nCooldown: 90 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Commands all your swords to gather and surround yourself in a storm of swords
details: Based on the number of swords that were active when Storm is used, the number of hits per attack is increased
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Adele is STR warrior class part of the Flora class group. Adele has a secondary resource (unlocked in 2nd Job) that is used to create 'Aether Swords' that can be commanded
